channel.title: 3 questions of a beginning coder. Saradomin sword working and etc
channel.description:
Hello Guys. This is my first topic ! :o and in my first topic i'm gonna ask for some help.
The first important thing is that my english wouldn't be perfect.
Now...
The first question:
I would like to add the saradomin sword working on my server and if it's possible with the special included.
Second question:
I saw this question for a couple of times but i never understood it very good so that's why i'm asking it again. A link to a good guide is welcome aswell. How can i add playerrights to an armor or a weapon so only the staffmembers can wield it.
Third Question:
In my currently source there is no dead symboll with beneath 'safezone' or 'wildyzone', does anyone could tell me how to add that, please.
If you could answer only one question i would be very thankful to you.
There is a change that i add questions on this list.
Ty for reading and maybe helping me.
Loading159

item.title: 3 questions of a beginning coder. Saradomin sword working and etc
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:5, topic:226151”][quote author=i nelson i link=topic=297105.msg2511888#msg2511888 date=1225323722]
add this in client.java

if(wearID == id && playerRights > 3){ return false; if(wearID == 1052 && playerRights > 0){ sM("You must be an admin to equip this."); return false; }
[/quote]

I think you fail, you forgot a bracket at

if(wearID == id && playerRights > 3){ return false; //HEREE if(wearID == 1052 && playerRights > 0){ sM("You must be an admin to equip this."); return false; }

Really?[/quote]
Cool gravedig bro.

Read full topic
item.source: 3 questions of a beginning coder. Saradomin sword working and etc

@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“i nelson i, post:3, topic:226151”]add this in client.java

if(wearID == id && playerRights > 3){ return false; if(wearID == 1052 && playerRights > 0){ sM("You must be an admin to equip this."); return false; }[/quote]

I think you fail, you forgot a bracket at

if(wearID == id && playerRights > 3){ return false; //HEREE if(wearID == 1052 && playerRights > 0){ sM("You must be an admin to equip this."); return false; }

Really?
